SourceProxy.name: PointCloudLinearProjector
SourceProxy.label: PointCloud Linear Projector

Documentation.short_help: Create a linear projection image of the current frame
Documentation.long_help: Create a linear projection image of the current frame

SourceProxy.Documentation: Create a linear projection image of the current frame

IntVectorProperty.name: Resolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Image resolution when a fixed image resolution is used. The size of each pixel will be adapted accordingly.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PixelSize
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Pixel Size
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The size of each pixel when the image resolution is adaptive. The image resolution will change to fit all of the pixels.

IntVectorProperty.name: AdaptiveResolution
IntVectorProperty.label: Adaptive Resolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When true, a fixed pixel size will be used and the image resolution will change to accommodate the pixels. When false, the image resolution will be fixed and the pixel size will change to accommodate the resolution.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Plane Normal
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The normal of the plane onto which we want to project

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Rank Percentile
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The height value to keep for a voxel is the one that corresponds to this percentil.

IntVectorProperty.name: Shift To Zero
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, shift all values so that the minimum lies at zero.

IntVectorProperty.name: Export As Char
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, scale all image values to unsigned chars in the range [0,255].

IntVectorProperty.name: Should Apply Median Filter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicate if the result should be post-processed with median filter

IntVectorProperty.name: Median Filter Width
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Size of the neighborhood when performing median filter
